text:
Vivacity Labs | London, UK | ONSITE | full time senior software engineer

----------

We use computer vision technology to better understand urban spaces. We are a smart cities company working with the public and private sectors to provide intelligent analytics on traffic, footfall, occupancy and movement in places of interest.

We are currently looking for a full time senior software engineer with experience in machine learning and computer vision systems. We provide a competitive salary with stock options. We are a fast growing, dynamic company with a superstar team and a clear vision for expanding our business.

Get in touch at julien(at)vivacitylabs(dot)com

http://vivacitylabs.com
